title: nitrobetting
author: nitrobetting
content: Matchup            Home Draw Away#Belgium v #Poland -152 +285 +425#Ireland v #Ukraine +130 +220 +230#Scotland v #Armenia -265 +370 +800#Wales v #Netherlands +510 +310 -182

comments.author: dwminer1
comments.body: In today's group A matches, I bet on the victories of the Netherlands and Belgium. Wales has had a tough match with Ukraine in which they finally secured their promotion to the World Cup. I think that after this success they can give up a little in the match against the Netherlands. In the Belgium - Poland match, I bet the hosts will win, because in my opinion it is a more mature and stable team.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: You do not have to bring be topic about UEFA Nations League on this board again as one is already existing and OP do not look like it should be a topic but rather just a post under a topic, there is an active thread you can ask for opinion or leave you opinionThe UEFA Nations League 2020/2021 Discussion ThreadAlways try to search for any topic you want to bring up on this forum before posting about it, even not only in just gambling board but on other boards as well.
